subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Scott Schoeneweis, a left-handed reliever, had torn a tendon behind his left knee, near his hamstring, and the tendon remained torn as he toiled for the Mets last season.
snippet: Scott Schoeneweis, a left-handed reliever, had torn a tendon behind his left knee, near his hamstring, and the tendon remained torn as he toiled for the Mets last season.
